class MyStack : Stack

    public MyStack()

        {
            ResolverQueryLogConfigId = aws_route53_resolver_query_log_config.Example.Id,

    }

}

			ResourceId:               pulumi.Any(aws_vpc.Example.Id),
		})

		}
		return nil
	})
}
